pages.text: Yin is not a kekki genkai, this means to obtain it you must first obtain a jutsu for it.At which point the mod will give you the item.Yin currently has 3 jutsu.

pages.title: genjutsu
pages.text: Upon using this jutsu, the target mob will be locked in place, given blindness and see a phantom image of the user walking towards them.It does no damage directly and there is no way to counter it.$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken:300$(li)Jutsuxp needed:500

pages.title: Mind body transfer
pages.text: Upon using this jutsu the user will leave their body and fly a short distance in the direction they used the jutsu, upon hitting a mob this will allow the user to control this mobs movements.This also works on players however in some cases may not work as intenede.$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken:Unkown$(li)Jutsuxp needed:375

pages.title: Shadow imitation
pages.text: Upon using this jutsu the user will send their shadow out towards their target, upon contact they will assume control of the targets movements and attacks (Use special jutsu key 2 to cancel).$(br) $(li)Max charge:1$(li)Chakra taken:100$(li)Jutsuxp needed:500
